data.title: Lee-Enfield Bolt-Action Rifles (UK)
data.meta_description: Lee-Enfield Bolt-Action Rifles (UK)  - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Lee-Enfield is a bolt-action, magazine-fed rifle that was used by British and Commonwealth forces from 1895 to the 1960s. Over 17 million were produced. It had a 10-round box magazine and fired the .303 British round. Variants included the Magazine Lee-Enfield from 1895-1926, the Short Magazine Lee-Enfield from 1904-present, and the Short Magazine Lee-Enfield Mk III from 1907-present. It was renowned for its high rate of accurate fire and long service life, serving as the British and Commonwealth standard rifle for over 60 years.
